# mono-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                        | Type                       | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------- | -------------------------- | ----------- |
| `text`   | `text`    | The text to display on the button. | `string`                   | `undefined` |
| `type`   | `type`    | The type of button.                | `"Primary" \| "Secondary"` | `'Primary'` |


## Events

| Event       | Description | Type               |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------ |
| `monoClick` |             | `CustomEvent<any>` |
